newsitem.title: FRANCE: BDDP wins Lyonnaise youth jobs campaign.
newsitem.headline: BDDP wins Lyonnaise youth jobs campaign.

text.p: French advertising agency BDDP is running a 6.0-million-franc press campaign for water and utilities group Lyonnaise des Eaux to promote youth employment, a Lyonnaise spokesman said.
"This campaign, awarded to BDDP, represents a purchase of 50 slots in the national press for six million francs," the spokesman said.

The campaign, which has as its slogan "Let's create jobs and open doors", aimed to mark publicly Lyonnaise's commitment to stimulate training schemes and to promote employment in growth areas such as environmental protection, construction and communication, a Lyonnaise statement said.
The campaign was launched on February 11 and is to run for three months.
London-based GGT Group Plc has agreed to buy BDDP.
